title: CHAPTER I. A LETTER AND A TELEGRAM.

book.title: Across Texas
book.description: 简介： NICK RIBSAM, of whom I had considerable to tell you in The Young Moose Hunters, returned to his humble home in Western Pennsylvania with his health fully restored by his stirring experience in the mountainous forests of Maine. He was naturally strong...
